name: Guillaume
description: At one point, Gustave tasked Guillaume, alongsideAlexandreandAdrien, to create a special mechanical arm for Gustave to wear, owing to him having lost his left arm in an accident. The three eagerly took on the task, successfully completing a special arm for their mentor.

name: Esquie
description: Esquie was once known as the most powerful being in the world, but since theFracturethe people ofLumièregradually came to regard him as legendary.Painted Versoand Monoco remained in close contact with him, and the three presumably went on countless adventures over the years.

name: Richard
description: RichardBasic InformationStatusDeceased (gommage monolith year 33)BornMonolith year 66Physical InformationHair colorBrownEye colorBlueGenderMalePersonal InformationOccupationSewing teacherFamilyChild(ren)Jules(son)Richardis a character inClair Obscur: Expedition 33.

name: Emma
description: Unlike her brother though, Emma believes everyone can do more good by staying in Lumière. Despite this, she understands that theexpeditionsprovide a sense of hope and morale for the city. She's also well aware these are her personal views and doesn't try to impose them onto others, such as allowing her ward,Maelle, to go withExpedition 33despite Maelle having 9 more years left before hergommage.

description: At one point, Gustave tasked Alexandre, alongsideAdrienandGuillaume, to create a special mechanical arm for Gustave to wear, owing to him having lost his left arm in an accident. The three eagerly took on the task, successfully completing a special arm for their mentor.

name: Danseuse Teacher
description: When speaking to the Nevron for the first time, it will talk about the dance of life and death and inviteLuneto a special encounter where she must parry every hit in a row in order to counter and complete the challenge. This awards theDanseuseoutfit forLune.

name: Unfinished Jar
description: Jar is also part of an optional side quest. When first found inAct I, he asks that you bring light to him. In this case, you need to find the resin in the next area and bring it back to him. You'll then need to light his lamp by free aiming and firing at it.

name: Painted Alicia
description: Aline's prolonged descent intoher son's childhood Canvascaused significant damage to her well-being, forcing a desperateRenoir Dessendreto enter the Canvas and attempt to destroy it by force. Their conflict resulted in theFracturewhich splitLumière, where the Painted Dessendres resided, from theContinent. The Painted Renoir ledthe first Expeditiontothe Monolithand discovered the truth. Upon their return to Lumière as the only survivors, the Painted Dessendres were treated with suspicion and a...

name: Sophie
description: Sophie was a widely admired figure inLumière. Prior to her Gommage, she datedGustave, a relationship many seemed to approve of, and both worked on the Aquafarm 3 project alongsideSciel. The two eventually broke up owing to their differences in whether or not to have children in a world without any real future, although they remained on friendly terms.

name: Blanche
description: Blanche was created byCleabut, unlike othernevrons, she made Blanche to carry out another task: to kill off theUnfinished Nevronsas these unfinished ones were proof of Clea's failures. However, as Blanche traveled around to do so, they were saddened by the state the unfinished ones were in and took pity on them and refused to kill them.

name: Marie
description: Marie is a young woman whosegommagecame up during monolith year 33. Despite others feeling their society was doomed to fall owing to their lives being cut short by thePaintressat a predetermined age, Marie felt it was everyone's duty to still have children to continue their society. As such, she didn't see eye to eye withSophie, who she was known to argue with on this topic, even up to the day of their shared gommage.

name: François
description: He resembles a large tortoise, with blue glowing mushrooms growing on his shell. He tends to like taking Esquie's rocks and antagonizing his neighbor.
